<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>c568a638-600a-4bdd-ab12-edac2855a5e4#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A hormonális rendszer</string>
            <string language="en">The hormonal system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das hormonale System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système hormonal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema hormonal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sistema ormonale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ορμονικό σύστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sistema hormonal</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ember belső elválasztású mirigyei; a hormonok hatása. A hormonrendszerrel kapcsolatos legfontosabb betegségek.</string>
            <string language="en">Human's endocrine glands; effect of hormones. The most important diseases connected with the hormonal system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">belső elválasztású mirigy,  hormonrendszer,  hormon,  szabályozás,  </string>
            <string language="en">endocrine gland, hormone-system, hormone, regulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Endokrine Drüsen des Menschen; Effekt der 
Hormone. Die wichtigsten Krankheiten schlossen an das hormonale 
System an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les glandes endocriniennes de l'humain ; 
effet des hormones. Les maladies les plus importantes 
liées au système hormonal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Glândulas de endocrine do ser humano; 
efeito dos hormones. As doenças as mais importantes 
conectaram com o sistema hormonal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ghiandole endocrine dell'essere umano; 
effetto degli ormoni. Le malattie più importanti relative
al sistema ormonale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενδοκρινείς αδένες ανθρώπου  επίδραση των 
ορμονών. Οι σημαντικότερες ασθένειες σύνδεσαν με το 
ορμονικό σύστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Glándulas de endocrina del ser humano; 
efecto de hormonas. Las enfermedades más importantes 
conectaron con el sistema hormonal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">endokrine Drüse, Hormon-System, Hormon, Regelung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">glande endocrinienne, hormone-système, hormone, règlement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">glândula de endocrine, hormone-sistema, hormone, regulamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ghiandola endocrina, ormone-sistema, ormone, regolazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενδοκρινής αδένας, ορμόνη-σύστημα, ορμόνη, κανονισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">glándula de endocrina, hormona-sistema, hormona, regulación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

    </metadata>
